dcterms:creator: Mihai Oltean
dcterms:description: A dataset of images containing fruits and vegetables. It contains different types of fruits and vegetables (including different varieties) like Apples, Apricot, Avocado, Avocado ripe, Banana, and many more. It has a total Number of classes: 131 (fruits and vegetables) of image size: 100x100 pixels.
dcterms:title: Fruits 360 Dataset

dcterms:creator: gulvarol
dcterms:description: SKU110k dataset is based on images of retail objects in a densely packed setting. It provides training, validation and test set images and the corresponding .csv files which contain information for bounding box locations of all objects in those images.
dcterms:title: Groceries tracking data set (SKU110)

dcterms:creator: Mereddy Divya
dcterms:description: Custom dataset created for grocery tracking in smart homes, specifically designed to capture the complexities of home refrigerator storage.
dcterms:title: Custom refrigerator dataset
